name: (R)elapse
description:
Game is best played in fullscreen. Please click the button in the bottom right corner of the frame.

Get the golden alarm clock to wake up the sleeping face of death, who guards your escape hole. To do this you will have to do work together with your former selves, turning the hands of time to find a path through.

Controls:

Tap or click on a square or use arrow keys / WASD to move.

Tap or click the hourglass or press 'r' or space to reset the level.

Credits:

Adrian Smith, Nick Perrin, Toby Dixon
